snippet: ZELMAN--Martin. The Board of Directors and Staff of The Israel Museum, Jerusalem, and of its American Friends mourn the passing of our friend, generous donor, and honorary fellow, Martin Zelman. We extend heartfelt condolences to the entire family. Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Co-Chairs, AFIM Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM James Snyder, Anne & Jerome Fisher, Dir., IMJ Leah Siegel, Exec Director, AFIM 1/3
lead_paragraph: ZELMAN--Martin. The Board of Directors and Staff of The Israel Museum, Jerusalem, and of its American Friends mourn the passing of our friend, generous donor, and honorary fellow, Martin Zelman. We extend heartfelt condolences to the entire family. Stephen Lash and Judy Steinhardt, Co-Chairs, AFIM Stacey Bronfman, President, AFIM James Snyder, Anne & Jerome Fisher, Dir., IMJ Leah Siegel, Exec Director, AFIM 1/3
